title: Total War: WARHAMMER III Announce Trailer - Conquer Your Daemons | Coming 2021
author: Total War
description:
In Total War: WARHAMMER III each choice you make will shape the reality-shattering conflict to come; from the mysterious Lands of the East to the daemon-infested Realms of Chaos. Will you conquer your daemons? Or command them? Coming 2021.

Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
Pre-purchase on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
Any questions? Check out the FAQ: https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

Video type: Cinematic trailer
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers

localize.description:
在《全面战争：战锤III》中，你所做的每一个选择都将影响到即将到来的现实破坏性冲突；从神秘的东方之地到被守护神侵袭的混沌之境。你是要征服你的守护神？还是指挥它们？即将于2021年推出。

Steam上预购：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
在Epic上预购：https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
有什么问题吗？请查看常见问题：https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

视频类型: 电影预告片
这意味着什么？完整的信息在这里。➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers
localize.title: 全面战争：战锤III》公布预告片--征服你的守护神｜即将于2021年推出。

localize.description:
在《全面戰爭：戰錘III》中，你所做的每一個選擇都將影響到即將到來的現實破壞性衝突；從神祕的東方之地到被守護神侵襲的混沌之境。你是要征服你的守護神？還是指揮它們？即將於2021年推出。

Steam上預購：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142710
在Epic上預購：https://www.epicgames.com/store/product/total-war-warhammer-3
有什麼問題嗎？請查看常見問題：https://www.totalwar.com/blog/total-war-warhammer-iii-faq

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

#TotalWar #WARHAMMERIII #WH3

視頻類型: 電影預告片
